categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Rexler Brath was a human male who served as a TIE fighter pilot within the Galactic Empire's Imperial Starfighter Corps. As a pilot, Brath wore the Imperial pilot uniform and flew a TIE/d "Defender" Multi-Role Starfighter. Brath had light skin, brown hair, and a mustache.
